Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: J A M
Reviews.Content: I love this camera and do recommend it. Pros: Takes amazing zoom photos, (that far away butterfly becomes a close up beauty!) The ability to start recording at the touch of a button (you had to turn a dial on my old camera which doesn't sound like a big deal but on this camera it's so much easier to catch the unexpected moments) Cons: the zoom makes this camera not compact enough to throw in your purse, it's awkward to carry around on the neck strap if you are leaning over to play or walk with a toddler because the camera is so heavy it swings around and bumps the toddler's head if you're not holding it with your other hand, the color pop feature, especially on the black and white photo setting is really cool so far the color options don't really match up to most of what I see in my every day life, I've only had luck with one of the yellow and one of the blue shades, the rechargeable battery pack doesn't indicate when the batteries are done charging. Overall a nice camera!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!
Reviews.Author: Anthony Furfari
Reviews.Content: I am so excited about this Camera, and the price I paid for the Camera and all the accessories.The Camera is Beautiful, Easy to Use, and delivers Great Pictures.The Shipping was super fast, and the product was packaged great.Only negative I would give is on the Accessories. Most of them are just cheap stuff.Only the SDHC memory card is top quality. I realize the Accessory package did not come from Nikon.Their Quality is top notch.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX L820
Reviews.Author: Ramanathan
Reviews.Content: After a long search I bought this camera during the father's day sale, it is a very good choice, I like it very much. It is a great value for money and the picture quality is awesome. Over all it is an excellent camera.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Daniel F.
Reviews.Content: I totally loved this camera, it has a good resolution fabolous zoom. its not to good if u want to take fast photos, it looks soother. but if u know to use in manual mode u can maybe fix that. for the rest i totally loved!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding
Reviews.Author: Gerald
Reviews.Content: The camera takes great pictures and works very well. I was very satisfied with the product and entire order process.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing!
Reviews.Author: robert e. keller
Reviews.Content: It is difficult to use in bright sunlight.  I keep seeing a reflection of my face in the viewer.. This makes it hard to focus on the item you are trying to photograph.

Reviews.Title: Just As Described
Reviews.Author: lavanda ward
Reviews.Content: I love my new camera! My husband go it for me and it takes great pictures would recommend! Great Camera

Reviews.Title: excellent. nikon is nikon. 25 years im using , nikons are the best.
Reviews.Author: Sam.
Reviews.Content: it was vy very nice.. value for money. nikon picture quality always better. always ever, nikon. nikon. nikon the best.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use but easy to blur...
Reviews.Author: Ben Mulder
Reviews.Content: We just got back from Las Vegas where we used this camera for the first time.  Our fault, we should have tried it out first.  Most of our pictures are slightly blurred-I blame my husband, but it could be the camera.

Reviews.Title: the batteries and charge are not working
Reviews.Author: Claudia Nacif Gomes
Reviews.Content: the batteries and charge are not working . I dont know what is happening. Would be possible to change it?

ProductInfo.Features:

4 Rechargeable AA 2900 Mah Nimh Batteries with AC/DC Rapid Battery Charger - 2 (two) 4 Slot Battery Tube Holders - Protective Digital Camera Carrying Case w/ Pockets & Strap
Flexible Legged Mini Table Tripod - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - HDMI Cable for direct connection to HDTV -  BONUS!! FREE 25 Quality Prints (promo code# on invoice)
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP Digital Camera with 30x Zoom (Black) + 4 AA Batteries with AC/DC Rapid Charger + 10pc Bundle 16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
